import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Avatar,IconButton} from '@material-ui/core' import './Chat.css' import { AttachFile, MoreVert, SearchOutlined } from '@material-ui/icons'; import InsertEmoticon from '@material-ui/icons/InsertEmoticon' import MicIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Mic' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' function Chat() { const [input,setInput]=useState("") const [seed,setSeed]=useState(""); const {roomId}=useParams(); useEffect(() => { setSeed(Math.floor(Math.random()*5000)) }, []) const sendMessage=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); setInput(""); } return

Room name

Last seen at ....

Ana Kalra Hey Guys 3:52pm

setInput(e.target.Value)} placeholder="Type a message" type="text">
} export default Chat
